resources.string:
My name is Ahmed Dghaies,

 I'm 22 years old and currently I'm a software engineer student at INSAT in Tunisia.

 Experienced working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in web application development, Spring Framework, .Net framework and mean full-stack.

 Also active in my community, I held a lot of positions like vice president of INSAT Samsung academy during 2017-2018, Designer, team leader, and a member of multiple clubs and associations.

 This is a description of my last internship:
 --- Full Stack Web Developer and Team Leader ---
 • Identified client needs and proposed possible solutions.
 • Designed a web and a mobile application for a service station manager and workers.
 • Collaborated within a team of 3 to organize and develop both of the applications.
 • Practiced and applied DevOps principles.
 • Documented the application modules in order to make it easier for the employees to learn how to use them.
